text: Does anyone know if `{{ site_settings.primary_accent_color }}` works in CSS?
but changing the colors in site settings isnt doing anything for this
nevermind, didnt see the republish disclaimer on HubL page

Is there anyway to reset the website analytics in HS? We have been building a clients site and want to reset all the views stats for the pages as they are all us or them going to the site to look at it prior to launch.
not sure if this will work retroactively, but you can add your IPs to the exclusion list under reporting settings
